channel.title: Clean-ish wLv3 base
channel.description:
UPDATED 17 NOV:
Okay, this is the source I've been making my project on for the past 3 - 4 months, it's wLv3 based. I've cleaned a fair bit out, though there's still a good 100KB more that can be cleaned. In this release I've removed a whole shit load of if statements and replaced them with switch statements, I was thinking of using arrays for some things but I really couldn't be bothered. At least in this release I decided to put a little effort into it.
I cleaned a bunch of smithing code out because I feel it can be done way better, might fix it in next release. I also added my Enchant Sapphhire code which can be used as a base for Superheat ect.
I also [U]give permission[/U] for others to clean this and release, the idea of me doing this in the first place is because this server has little-to-no features.
NOTE: I DIDN'T CLEAN THE ENTIRE THING. I only cleaned some small amounts of things, it can be further cleaned and reduced in size more. Client.java's current size is: [S]359KB[/S] updated: 293KB, even with all the things which may not be necessary.
[center]Some details about this server:
Very good economy-base to start a server. Fairly clean, you have to add your emotes in the emote tab again. Shit combat, you'll need to work on it yourself because every time I ask someone where I can find it so I can work on it they say I plan to leech /facepalm. Most skills erased so you can add your own, to add them in their class files you MUST follow the int's. If you haven't got at least basic knowledge of programming JAVA, this is not for you.
When you download this you must compile right away to get the .class files back, I deleted them to make uploading/downloading faster. That's why it's [S]31MB[/S]updated: 23MB [/center]
Pic of no class's: [URL=http://img21.imageshack.us/i/lolkvn.png/][IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/7245/lolkvn.png[/img][/URL]
Still don't trust it? Don't download. Simple.
Download links: http://uppit.com/v/5PQTUR0U http://www.megaupload.com/?d=2MT3BWG2
If any problems occur please feel free to contact me here or on my msn. MSN: ii_jeba_ii@hotmail.com

item.title: Clean-ish wLv3 base
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

Bumped as I released a V2.

[quote=“WAFFLE-, post:6, topic:313764”]Dood i need a source like this for my project v1 ty bro ur the beast =D

Edit1: Nvm this is shit, freezes most clients kthx.[/quote]

No, it’s not shit; nor does it crash any clients. You obviously use MoparScape client to try and connect /facepalm[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 17, 2009, 07:17:26 am[/size][hr][quote=“jmood128, post:7, topic:313764”]Update!! :mad: I wanna see your best work so I can leech it ;), jk but if I can suggest in your next release you should package it.[/quote]

Btw packaging shits me, I fucking HATE clicking 10 damned files just to find one goddamned thing. *megapissedoff@packaging

Read full topic
